name: vexa
description: Server side render with remote modules

scripts.dev: yarn run clear && yarn run bootstrap && yarn run lerna:build
scripts.dev:app: lerna run build --scope=@vexa/core-app && lerna run build --scope=@vexa/cli-app
scripts.lerna:build: yarn run lerna:build-tools && yarn run lerna:build-core && yarn run lerna:build-cli && yarn run lerna:build-package
scripts.lerna:build-cli: lerna run build --scope=@vexa/cli-config && lerna run build --scope=@vexa/cli-app
scripts.clear: yarn run clear:dist && yarn run clear:yarn.lock && yarn run clear:coverage && yarn run clear:node_modules

author: Pan Alexey <pan-alexey@live.com>
